articles.title: 2-time Oscar winner Tom Hanks says he's made 4 'pretty good' movies in his 40-year career - CNBC
articles.description: The 66-year-old Hanks says that it's a "miracle" that any movie makes it through the "confounding" production process.
articles.content:
Tom Hanks may just be the most modest man in Hollywood.
Despite building a career that spans more than 80 films and six Oscar nominations, the 66-year-old actor commented in a recent interview that … [+1909 chars]
